group_1.textRight: Heyo!

group_1.textLeft: My, my, it's Tsurunoâ™ª
I made some adjustments to the story and@pictures you gave me.
Would you like to see it?

group_1.textRight: Of course! Come on, lemme see it!
Whoa, the pictures are sooo cute! Did you@draw them, Mitama?

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* No, a customer of mine did.
I had a Magical Girl who's passionate about@drawing take care of the art...
And a girl who loves books thought up the@rest of the story!

group_1.textRight: Thanks! Can I read it?

group_1.textLeft: Go right ahead!
The earlier parts of the story are exactly@the same as what you read to me.

group_1.textRight: So we can continue from where we left off!
All right, take two! Action!

group_1.narration: The Invisible Monster was@gnawing away at everyone's time.
It had consumed so much that it was@even taking bites out of the past...
Eventually, the Smiley Kingdom@was forced to rewind all the way@back into its own past.

group_1.textRight: Hey... This is pretty bad, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it's REALLY bad!
We really gotta beat up that monster before@it gobbles up all of time!
I get the feeling...if the Ferris wheel@fades away...
That'll mark the end of this kingdom!@For good!

group_1.textRight: I think so too.
But...[chara:100400:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:100400:lipSynch_1]we can't see the monster with our@naked eyes, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's the problem...[chara:110300:eyeClose_1]

group_1.narration: Tsuruno and her friends stressed over where@to find the Invisible Monster...but then!
A mysterious Coordinator appeared@before them to give them some advice.

group_1.textRight: Well, well, Tsuruno! Looks like you're in@quite a fix.
I think you should seek out the Great Sage@of Journeys.
I'm sure she'll be able to give you a hint@or two.

group_1.textLeft: O-okay...

group_1.textRight: Oh, yes! And I'll give you this.

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Is this...a jewel?

group_1.textRight: Try using it when things are especially@dire. [chara:101700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]Farewell!
Who the heck was that?

group_1.narration: Tsuruno's team continued@to search the kingdom.
When they eventually reached the@Ferris wheel that stood in the heart of@the Smiley Kingdom, they were able@to meet the Great Sage of Journeys.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Oh, so good of you to find me!
You girls are trying to find the lair of the@Invisible Monster, right?

group_1.textRight: Yep!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* I thought so.
Hey, [chara:100700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:100700:lipSynch_1][chara:100700:eyeClose_1]don't you think its name is pretty@funny?

group_1.textRight: Huh? Its name?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, its name!
I have no idea who named it that, but@it isn't "invisible" at all.
That monster's been here since the start!
In fact, all of you have been looking right@at it for ages now.

group_1.textRight: Hmm... This is some kinda riddle, isn't it?
Just tell us where it is already!

group_1.textLeft: Its magic will hold until you come to the@answer on your own.
Sooo... Figure it out amongst yourselves,@would you?

group_1.textRight: It's been there since the start... Something@we've been looking at for ages?
Ugh! I don't get it at all!

group_1.textLeft: How about you? Have you worked it out?

group_1.textRight: You know what? I think I have!
The Invisible Monster is really...
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][se:4051_landing_throw]THIS!

group_1.textLeft: Th-the Ferris wheel...

group_1.textRight: She smashed it!
[chara:301000:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.narration: Yes, it turned out that the monster sat in@the heart of the kingdom from the beginning.
The so-called Invisible Monster had@disguised itself as a Ferris wheel and@had sat there, greedily gobbling up time!

group_1.textRight: Wow, you're pretty smart!
How did you work THAT out?!
*Giggle*
When time went back into the past, all the@people vanished...
But no matter how much time passed, the@Ferris wheel didn't!
I bet if we beat it, we can win back all the@time it ate! Let's do it!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!
